title: Flavour, food? Type? HOW???
content:
This image is the output of an assignment which we got.. Which was to think of a pair of opposite words , then think of their visuals, but they should have a common theme. So i took the theme vegetables, and the words hot and cool.. and in case u still dont get this image.. its a chilli and a cucumber slice.( chilli gives a hot feeling.. cucumber is cool lol!)

Now i need some help.. i need to integrate a word into it, some what like a title on it..  
Attaching some stupid exploration i did.. please help me on it.. and all criticism and suggestions are welcome!!

Thank you!
